author: Janani Karthik
title: I had a hearty laugh when I listened to Simbu’s outburst
text:
The clash between the two factions of the Tamil Cinema industry contesting the upcoming Nadigar Sangam elections got more heated after Simbu took a direct dig at Vishal in a press meet that was held recently.
In his speech, Simbu lashed out at Vishal, and said Vishal has been trying to break the unity of the industry 'family'. Apparently, Simbu also called Vishal a 'fox' while commenting on his stance on the Nadigar Sangam issue, saying Vishal has been doing things that only a sly fox would do, and that he has been trying to divide the actors who have been like one big family so far.
Quite contrary to Simbu, who was very aggressive and emotional while speaking, Vishal is pretty much unperturbed by all the allegations the Vaalu actor has made regarding him. When we called him, he asked us, "I had a hearty laugh when I listened to Simbu's speech. What else can I say?"
He added, "I will continue with my efforts as far as the Nadigar Sangam elections are concerned, and will continue to fight for the justice."
